settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.content: Return PolicyTo be eligible for a return, your item(s) must be unused and in original condition. Shipping & Handling fees are non-refundable, unless an item(s) is damaged or defective. Item(s) must be returned in original packaging or at least a comparable box sufficient not to damage the item(s) during return shipping.A $3.50 restocking fee will be applied to all returns, except for damaged or defective item(s). This Return & Exchange policy is good for 30 days after receiving your order.Returns and exchanges typically take 1-2 weeks once we receive the item(s)
